description: Loved the original (individual) versions of these apps. All the puzzles in this combined version crash back to the launcher immediately.
freezes a lot, especially my favorite "galaxies" game when set to 15x15 unreasonable...
Big collection of puzzle and logic games. Not integrated into GTK or anything, but they work perfectly well. Very simple and fast programs.

I installed it in ubuntu 18 and it worked splendidly. It was very convenient to how all of SGT puzzles from one launcher. Unfortunately, it doesn't work in Ubuntu 20. It works up to the point where it launches a game from the selection menu, but you can not edit the puzzle at all. Will give 5 stars when the game controls are fixed for my new computer.
summary: It was great while it worked

description: It just doesn't work. The games open but I can't click on anything and nothing happens. I know this collection is actually great, the games are great. But I can't get it to work.
Non parte nessuma delle applicazioni. Un launcher che non lancia

Used to love this hub for SGT Puzzles. Can launch any SGT Puzzle from the main window. But for some reason it now crashes and gets back to the main window right after launching any game. 

GNOME Shell 3.38, Ubuntu 20.04.

I never had any crashes, all games - I tried (about 75%) - are great. The rules are sometimes a bit bulky. Because of that I skipped a few games. Improving the rules writing would improve the overall application a lot!

40-some great little games that require logical thinking, rather than speed (although it comes with its own, improved Minesweeper as well). No ads, works off-line, and in some twenty years of playing these games, I haven't encountered any bugs whatsoever. HIghly recommended.

I can not edit the game settings (Ubuntu 20), only able to play the most basic levels.
When that is fixed, I will change the score to 5 stars.

Se trata de una colección que tengo en el móvil, la tablet y los ordenadores. No requieren grandes recursos, te permiten evaluar cómo aprendes o no varias sencillas destrezas, en definitiva exhiben inteligencia a un coste de recursos elemental.
Se nota que el desarrollador y mantenedores, disfrutan con ellos. Algunas añoramos saber la programación que tiene detrás, porque también debe ser divertida si la comprendes.

Mucho ánimo para el mantenedor o mantenedores.

PD.:Debe faltar alguna biblioteca o algo entre los archivos que vienen en el software de Ubuntu 20.04
summary: ME ENCANTA la colección, pero en Ubuntu 20.04 no puedo usarla

description: Ocurre algo extraño, abre los juegos pero no permite jugarlos porque no permite mover el putero ni acepta entradas de teclado
Ce snap contient l'ensemble des jeux de Tatham, belle collection !
summary: Tous les jeux dans un lanceur

description: Установилось само...неизвестно откуда...и никак не удаляеться....жрет оперативу....расшатывает систему....надо видимо переустанавливать бубунту-22.04
